long_description: Designed to help you beat the heat during warm-weather adventures, the Columbia Freezer Zero bandana protects you from UV rays and helps cool your skin thanks to innovative fabric technology. Stretch-polyester fabric blend features Omni-Freeze(R) Zero technology that actually cools when sweat and water hit the surface, helping you stay comfortable on hot days. Fabric features UPF 50+ sun protection.
short_description: Designed to help you beat the heat during warm-weather adventures, the Columbia Freezer Zero bandana protects you from UV rays and helps cool your skin thanks to innovative fabric technology.
